name: Hide The Body If You Must
name_original: Hide The Body If You Must
description: A light-hearted, comedic choose-your-own-adventure short story where you play a Detective who is trying to solve a murder. But, the only mystery to be solved is how you can get away with killing your neighbor. Unfortunately, you are assigned the case you committed with your quirky assistant, Samantha. Try your best to cover your tracks and don't get caught.
